name: Pac-Runner
description:
WARNING: It's a little bit scary game!

Pac-Runner is 3rd person controlled Game, which moves through a maze and tries to collect coins. Collecting all coins makes him winner, without boring stages. There are four ghost in total, considering them as the enemies,they are trying to catch player. If the ghost touches player, he loses a life.

At some positions, there are four stars, helping Pac-Runner to eat the enemies. The enemies turn blue, reverse direction and trying to escape from Pac-Runner. When ghosts are eaten they turn in black and will be respawned shortly .

It's an amazing chance to get your memory back! You just have to collect all the coins and flee from the ghost and make fun, from it of course!
